mapper.select: select b.ciid, b.ciname, b.conditions, c.execution_type, c.schedule, b.domain, b.sparql from tnsda_context_model_info a, tnsda_context_info b, tnsda_context_model c where a.use_yn = 'Y' and b.use_yn='Y' and a.tnsda_context_model_cmid = #{cmid} and a.tnsda_context_info_ciid = b.ciid and a.tnsda_context_model_cmid = c.cmid
mapper.insert: insert into tnsda_subscribe(cmid, ciid, uri, notification_uri, subscribe_time, cuser) values (#{cmid}, #{ciid}, #{uri}, #{notification_uri}, #{subscribe_time}, #{cuser})
